thread.title: Every State In Nigeria Is Important To US – American Ambassador
thread.title_full: Every State In Nigeria Is Important To US – American Ambassador

posts.author: Nawuzoma Anthony (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Every State In Nigeria Is Important To US – American Ambassador
posts.text:
The American Ambassador to Nigeria, Stuart Symington said that every state in Nigeria is important for Nigeria’s growth and socio-economic development. 

Stuart said this, during a visit to Governor Okezie Ikpeazu of Abia State on Monday, November 6, at the in Umuahia, reinstated the desire and interest of his country in the success of Nigeria.

He called on Governor Ikpeazu to ensure that his vision for the state include a platform that would create opportunities for the people to better their lives.

“I came here for a reason and it is a profound idea, every state of Nigeria is important to Nigeria and every state in Nigeria is important to the Government and people of United States of America.

“I think as Nigeria does well by assuring all the people to work together and as Nigeria does better, I think that all of Africa and all the world will be better. The ties between our countries are strong but the most important ties we have is between our people, we have a profound interest in the success of your country and each of your people.

“There is so much to learn about your state, and need to understand your vision, and most importantly to understand what you are doing to move that vision forward. How you intend to create the opportunity for the people, young and old to have a rewarding, fulfilled and meaningful life,” he said.

Governor Ikpeazu while appreciating the US Ambassador for the visit said his administration has made several economic visits to the United States of America which has yielded results in the areas of health and commerce.

“We have benefitted handsomely in terms of health outreaches and we are working together with some of the experts in America to turn some of our health institutions into tertiary health institution where organ transplant can be carried out.

“Beyond health, we are also prepared to be part of the opportunities of the initiatives which the American Government promotes and support in Nigeria.”

posts.title: Συντετριμμένος ο Jimmy Fallon- Έχασε τη μητέρα του και ακυρώνει τις εκπομπές του
posts.text:
Συντετριμμένος ο Jimmy Fallon- Έχασε τη μητέρα του και ακυρώνει τις εκπομπές του 
«Έχασα τον μεγαλύτερο θαυμαστή μου», ήταν η λιτή δήλωση του παρουσιαστή Share «Έχασα τον μεγαλύτερο θαυμαστή μου», ήταν η λιτή δήλωση του παρουσιαστή Ο διάσημος Αμερικανός παρουσιαστής Jimmy Fallon βρίσκεται σε βαρύ πένθος, καθώς έχασε τη μητέρα του Gloria, σε ηλικία 68 ετών, το Σάββατο που μας πέρασε στη Νέα Υόρκη. «Έχασα τον μεγαλύτερο θαυμαστή μου», ήταν η λιτή δήλωση του παρουσιαστή, σύμφωνα με το περιοδικό People που μετέφερε τα πρώτα του λόγια μετά τη δυσάρεστη είδηση. Το κανάλι που προβάλλεται η εκπομπή «The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon», επιβεβαίωσε πως τα ζωντανά επεισόδια αυτής της εβδομάδας ακυρώνονται, ενώ στη θέση τους θα προβληθούν επαναλήψεις. Το NBC επιβεβαίωσε την ακύρωση αυτής της εβδομάδας με μία λιτή και συλλυπητήρια ανακοίνωση. «Εκ μέρους όλων στο NBC εκφράζουμε τα βαθύτατα συλλυπητήρια στον Jimmy και όλη την οικογένειά του για αυτή τη μεγάλη απώλεια. Οι σκέψεις όλων μας είναι μαζί με τον Jimmy και όλους όσους οι ζωές αγγίχτηκαν από την αγάπη, την ευγένεια και τη στήριξη της Gloria Fallon», αναφέρει το κανάλι. Gloria Fallon

thread.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) LEO Intermittent Lecturer
thread.title_full: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) LEO Intermittent Lecturer

posts.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) LEO Intermittent Lecturer
posts.text:
University of Michigan LEO Intermittent Lecturer in Ann Arbor , Michigan 
How to Apply 
To apply, submit application materials (in a single PDF file), via the following web address: http://seas.umich.edu/form/leo intermittent lecturer winter 2018 eas 610 
Job Summary 
The successful applicant will be expected to teach graduate students at the university during Winter term 2018.The School for Environment and Sustainability (SEAS) at the University of Michigan invites individuals to apply for the position of Intermittent Lecturer. 
EAS 610 “Life Cycle Assessment Methods and Software Tools” is a 1.5 credit course to be offered in Winter B term of 2018. This course is intended for students who have taken (or are enrolled in) Industrial Ecology and wish to expand their life cycle assessment (LCA) skill set. The course covers advanced LCA methods and key software tools used to conduct LCA studies including SimaPro and GaBi. 
Examples of the skills that will be covered include advanced impact assessment methods, consequential vs. attributional LCA, allocation rules, and transportation fuel and vehicle technology modeling using the new GREET.net program. The course will also cover tools for generating and characterizing results such as uncertainty analysis using RiskSim Monte Carlo simulation software and sensitivity/scenario analyses using Excel What-If Analysis tools. At the end of the semester a final project will allow students to demonstrate these advanced LCA methods/tools. Development of course content is required during the Winter A term. The expected percentage of effort for this course is 17%. 
The Lecturer will be responsible for overall course content, homework, a final project, and laboratory content. 
Required Qualifications* 
For this course, a PhD in environmental science or a closely related field with expertise in LCA is required. 
At least one year of teaching experience at the college/university level is also required. 
Additional Information 
This position is subject to the terms of the LEO bargaining agreement. 
Application Deadline 
Job openings are posted for a minimum of ten calendar days. This job may be removed from posting boards and filled anytime after the minimum posting period has ended. This posting will end on November 16, 2017. Applications should include a letter explaining qualifications and teaching philosophy and a current CV. 
U-M EEO/AA Statement 
The University of Michigan is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer. 
Job Detail

posts.author: 다비드
posts.title: 논현동 척추교정병원 유재활의학과를 소개합니다.
posts.text:
건강지켜요 논현동 척추교정병원 유재활의학과를 소개합니다. 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 지도로 보기 전체지도 지도닫기 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/spero0409/221134702254 척주, 관절은 방치할 경우 더 악화되고
일상생활에 많은 문제를 초래합니다.
그래서
논현동 척추교정병원으로 잘 알려진 유재활의학과를 소개해 드립니다.
논현척추교정병원 유재활의학과의원은 재활의학과 전문의를 비롯하여
우수한 의료진 및 경험이 풍부한 치료사와 함께
X-ray, 3D 체형분석기, 초음파 검사등을 통해
환자의 상태를 체계적이고 과학적이며, 합리적으로 분석하여
개개인별 몸에 적합한 치료를
1 : 1 맞춤 치료를 진행합니다.
진단을 한번만 하는 것이 아니라 정기적으로
피드백 시스템을 통하여 환자분의 상태를 정확하게
체크하고 치료하기 때문에
환자분들의 건강한 삶을 되찾는데 도움을 드립니다.
비수술목, 어깨, 허리통증 치료병원인
유재활의학과는 수술이 필요한 분에게
비수술치료만으로치료가 가능하다는 거짓말을 하지 않습니다.
그래서
많은 분들이 한번 오시고 지인들에게
믿고 소개하는 논현동척추교정병원으로 손꼽힙니다.
척주관절질환은 시간이 지난다고 회복되지 않습니다.
이유없는 통증이 없으니
정확한 검사와 정확한 진단, 그리고 그에 맞는
적합한 치료가 가능한
논현동 척추교정병원 유재활의학과로
점심시간이나, 퇴근시간이라도
시간을 내어 치료받기를 바랍니다.
꾸준한 치료가 없을 경우 치료 결과는 좋지 않고
치료기간만 증가하게 되니
환자와 의사 모두 치료에 노력해야겠습니다.
무엇보다도
우리나라 4명 중 1명은 척추질환으로 고생하고 있기에
매우 흔한 질환이므로
연령 불문하고 통증을 느끼신다면 바로 상담과 진료 받아 보세요~
논현동 척추교정병원 유재활의학과는 적합한 치료를 위해
Y재활 도수치료를 진행 중에 있습니다.
Y재활 도수치료란
정통재활치료와 CROS치료가 함께 병행되는 것을 말합니다.
CROS치료란
카이로프랙틱(C)과 근막이완치료(R)
슈로스 측만증 운동(S)과 정골의학(O)을 합한 것입니다.
환자 개개인별 적합한 치료방법은 각기
다를 수 있기 때문에
유재활의학과는 미국 국립재활원 정통재활치료를 바탕으로
카이로프랙틱, 근막이롼치료, 정골의학, 슈로스측만증운동을
통해
모두 치료할 수 있는 곳입니다.
논현동 척추교정병원 유재활의학과는
환자 개개인별 가장 적합한 치료를 진행하고 있다는 점을 잊지 마세요~
다양한 척추 관절 질환의 증상을 개인적으로 자가 진단할 수 있도록
위의 이미지를 참고바랍니다.
손목터널증후군 자가진단은
현대인들이 스마트폰이나 키보드, 등 손목 사용이 많아
그때 통증을 느낀거나
선힘이 약해지고 손가락 끝부분이 찌릿찌릿함을 감지 한다면
한번 의심해 볼만합니다.
어께통증은 모두 오십견이라는 편견도 버리세요
정확한 진단만이
건강한 생활을 영유할 수 있습니다.
그냥 방치하지 마시고
통증을 느끼거나 조금이라도 이상을 느낀다면
언제든지 유재활의학과와 상담하세요~
전화번호 : 02-3444-1972
전화상담은 언제든지 가능합니다.

thread.title: 新晨动力深度捆绑“宝马概念” 宝马授权第二款发动机绵阳投产
thread.title_full: 新晨动力深度捆绑“宝马概念” 宝马授权第二款发动机绵阳投产

posts.title: 新晨动力深度捆绑“宝马概念” 宝马授权第二款发动机绵阳投产
posts.text:
（全景图片） 
经济观察网 记者 郭有信 实习记者 胡闻文 继宝马N20发动机之后，宝马授权华晨生产的第二款高端发动机在绵阳新晨动力投产。10月27日，宝马王子发动机在华晨控股子公司新晨动力投产。这款从宝马王子发动机衍生升级而来的产品，会装载在华晨未来的中高端车型上。而这款发动机给华晨带来显然并不仅仅是改变自主车型的竞争力——华晨集团董事长祁玉民此前表示，这些发动机同时不排除向第三方企业出售的可能。 
据悉，这次授权生产的发动机包括最大功率150kW的1.6T（CE16）和最大功率170kW的1.8T（CE18，预计明年投产）两款，未来还将加入1.2T产品。该发动机是在宝马王子发动机基础上研发的衍生产品。目前，新晨动力在绵阳生产基地有两条生产线生产这款发动机，日产能可达到1320台，在沈阳还有一条生产线用于生产这款发动机。宝马集团高级副总裁安格宏表示，这款发动机在新晨动力的生产标志着该公司在产品制造上攀上了新高峰，宝马将在技术支持、质量管控等方面继续与新晨动力保持紧密合作关系。 
资料显示，宝马王子系列发动机（Prince Engine）集双涡管增压、高精度直喷、连续可变气门升程、双连续可变气门正时等技术于一身，多次获得沃德十佳发动机奖项。该发动机研发的初衷是为了取代宝马的N4x系列发动机以及标致雪铁龙集团的TU系列发动机，是宝马和PSA集团用于全面更新换代之用的一款产品，融合了宝马和PSA集团众多的顶尖技术，在宝马内部代号为N1x，如N13、 N14、 N16和N18，在MINI以及第二代宝马1系的不少车型上使用。 
5年前，宝马集团就首次授权体系外企业即新晨动力生产宝马N20发动机，2014年6月N20发动机在华晨投产以来，除了搭载华晨宝马车型以外，华晨自主品牌车型也配备了这款发动机。其中华晨的高端自主品牌华颂就搭载的是N20发动机，华晨将之作为最大的卖点。王子发动机成功投产之后，华晨也早有计划将王子发动机配备于华晨整车，N20发动机生产线逐渐被取代，仅供华颂车型使用。从此来看，华晨宝马3系、5系将使用更为先进的宝马发动机。 
新晨动力是四川首家汽车类上市公司，产品包括轻型汽油机和轻型柴油机共5大系列30余个品种，市场保有量280万台。公司于2013年3月13日在香港联合交易所主板上市，由华晨汽车集团和五粮液集团对等控股。在宝马支持下，新晨动力业务延伸至制造发动机核心零部件，已成为华晨宝马发动机曲轴的唯一供应商，及华晨宝马发动机连杆的重要供应商。 
而由此，新晨动力的业绩也与华晨中国一样，与宝马直接相关。今年上半年，新晨动力曾供稿表示，截至2017年6月30日止中期业绩，该集团期内收益为12.38亿元人民币，同比减少28.1%。毛利为1.59亿元，同比减少31.8%。公告显示，期内收益减少主要受累于N20汽油机的销售下跌。N20汽油机的销售下跌，则是由于宝马汽车于2017年停用N20发动机所致。 
据新晨动力2016年年报数据，2016年的前五大客户收入占比86.1%，前五大供应商采购金额占比46.2%。未来，多产品供给是新晨动力需要走的路，该公司在2016年年报中还曾透露，公司目前在研发的一台三汽缸发动机，可兼容电子马达。此次，王子发动机的投产将有效弥补其在产品线上的布局短缺，有望为公司业绩增长带来新的动力。

posts.author: info@tabnak.ir
posts.title: شهادت یک مامور انتظامی در درگیری با قاچاقچیان
posts.text: 07 November 2017 امتیاز خبر: 84   4479 فرمانده انتظامی خراسان‌شمالی از شهادت مامور انتظامی شهرستان شیروان که در درگیری با یک قاچاقچی مصدوم شده بود، خبر داد. به گزارش ابتکار، علیرضا مظاهری اظهار کرد: شهید «حمید رحیم‌فر» مامور انتظامی شیروان که روز جمعه در درگیری با یک قاچاقچی و شرور مسلح در این شهرستان مورد اصابت گلوله قرار گرفته بود، بعدازظهر یکشنبه به دلیل شدت جراحات به خیل شهدا پیوست. وی افزود: استوار یکم حمید رحیم‌فر بر اثر شدت جراحات وارده در بیمارستان شهرستان شیروان به شهادت رسید. وی درباره درگیری روز جمعه و زخمی شدن استوار حمید رحیم‌فر، تصریح کرد: متهم که به جرم حمل و فروش مواد مخدر زندانی و به قید وثیقه آزاد شده بود، در زمان مقرر به زندان باز نگشت و خود را معرفی نکرد. از این‌رو ماموران کلانتری و یگان امداد برای جلب متهم به منزل وی رفتند که متهم اقدام به تیراندازی به‌سوی ماموران کرد. فرمانده انتظامی خراسان شمالی بیان کرد: در این تیراندازی استوار یکم، حمید رحیم‌فر مورد اصابت گلوله قرار گرفت و بعدازظهر یکشنبه بر اثر شدت جراحات وارده به شهادت رسید. مظاهری گفت: مراسم تشییع این شهید بزرگوار در هفته جاری برگزار و در محل زندگی‌اش به خاک سپرده می‌شود.

thread.title: 2017 1107 토익LC 파트7 문제해설
thread.title_full: 2017 1107 토익LC 파트7 문제해설 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: 파워토익 파워회화
posts.title: 2017 1107 토익LC 파트7 문제해설
posts.text:
W: Good afternoon. Mr. Martinez. This is Cleanse Plus calling. The dry cleaning that you dropped off two says ago is ready to be retrieved.
M: Thank you, but I unfortunately won't be able to get the suit fot a few says. I;ll be out of town from tomorrow on a business trip. Is there any way someone from your service can deliver the item direclt to my office while L'm away?
W: We can arrange fot a courier to take the suit to your office by Thursday afternoon if you provide me with your builsing address. however, that will cost an additional $25.
M: That's fine. You can charge it to the credit catd number you have on file for me. And my office is on the 10th floor at 270 Brayman Street.
(1) Where most likely does the woman work?
(A) At a clothing store
(B) At a laundry setvice
(C) At a construction firm
(D) At a delivery company
(2) What problem does the man mention?
(A) He forgot his bysiness card.
(B) He did nit dress appropruately.
(C) He cannot pick up a garment.
(D) He wrote down incorrect details.
(3) What problem does the man agree to do?
(A) Enroll in a membership
(B) Pick up a shipment
(C) Return a damaged item
(D) Pay an extra chareg
[어휘]
retrieve 되찾아가다, 회수하다
arrange 처리하다
additional 추가의
construction 건축, 건설
garment 옷, 의류
[해석]
W: 안녕하세요. Mr. Martinez 여기는 Cleanse Plus 입니다. 이틀 전에 맡기신 드라이클리닝한 세탁물이 되찾아갈 준비가 되었습니다.
M: 감사합니다만, 공교롭게도 며칠 동안은 그 정장을 찾지 못할 것 같습니다. 제가 출장을 가서 내일부터 이 동네에 없을 거라서요. 제가 없는 동안에 당신의 업체 사람이 옷을 제 사무실로 직접 배달해줄 수 있나요?
W: 제게 건물 주소를 알려주시면, 배달원이 목요일 오후까지 고객님의 사무실로 정장을 가져가도록 처리해드릴 수 있습니다. 하지만, 그것은 추가로 25달러가 들 겁니다.
M: 괜찬습니다. 제 기록에 있는 신용 카드 번호로 그것을 청구하시면 됩니다. 그리고 제 사무실은 Brayman가 270번지 10층에 있습니다.
[해설]
Q1
여자가 일하는 장소를 묻는 문제이므로, 신분 및 직없과 관련된 표현을 놓치지 않고 듣는다. 여자가 "This os Cleanse Plus calling. The dry cleaning that you dropped off two days ago is ready to retrieved."라며 자신이 Cleanse Plus에서 전화한다고 한 뒤, 청자가 이틀 전에 맡긴 드라이클리닝한 세탁물이 되찾아갈 준비가 되었다고 하였다. 따라서 정답은 (B) At a laundry setvice이다.
Q2
남자의 문제점을 묻는 문제이므로, 남자의 말을 주의 깊게 듣는다. 남자가 "I unfortunately won't ve avle to get the suit fot a few days"라며 공교롭게도 며칠 동안은 정장을 찾지 못할 것 같다고 하였다. 따라서 정답은 (C) He cannot pick up a garment.이다.
Q3
남자가 하기로 동의하는 것을 묻는 문제이므로, 질문의 핵심어구(agree to do)와 관련된 내용을 주의 깊게 듣는다. 여자가 남나에게"that[ to arrange for a courier to take the suit to your office] will codt an assitional $25"라며 배달운이 사무실로 정장을 가져가도록 하는 데에는 추가로 25달러가 들 거라고 하자. 남자가 "That's fine"이라며 괜찮다고 하였다. 따라서 정답은(D) Pay an extra chareg 이다.
출처:토익실전1000

thread.title: Review of Film "Antichrist"
thread.title_full: Review of Film "Antichrist"

posts.title: Review of Film "Antichrist"
posts.text: by: MovieWatcher Keywords: film , movie I like to watch various films. And not long ago I found the film "Antichrist" at Dreamfilmen service and I would like to dwell upon it. This film has received a lot of bad criticism which I believe is unjustified. If you're a big fan of Lynch, then you won't go wrong with this movie. The outline of the movie is that a partnership suffers the loss of a son. The female protagonist is really hardly hit by grief. Her partner [Defoe] is a psycho therapist. He believes her medication is far too high and ought to work out the fear and grief as a joint mission! The female opens up that her fear comes from a place called Eden where she studied a thesis on witchcraft. The pair make their way to the countryside where the trouble begins! This movie works on 3 distinct layers. The first is the banal... kid dies, psycho babble and psychosis. The next is more mental, what happens with release both sexual and through frustration. The final one is biblical. What if adam and eve, god and the devil or an angel and eve went back to the garden to confront where they went wrong? What would happen? There's a lot of imagery for all these aspects. I'd pay close attention to the trees [of life and knowledge maybe], the burning of feet and the tree which has been destroyed. Additionally I'd pay attention to the opening and closing scenes and the argument Defoe uses with his partner about her thesis and the things she ought to have learnt. All in all, if you like Lynch with his metaphor plus shock horror which is beautifully scripted as well as directed you cannot go wrong with this movie! If there's only only regret... I wish I saw it at the movies!

thread.title: Rassegna stampa: prime pagine Gazzetta, Corriere e Tuttosport di martedì 7 novembre 2017
thread.title_full: Rassegna stampa: prime pagine Gazzetta, Corriere e Tuttosport di martedì 7 novembre 2017

posts.author: Mirko Nicolino
posts.title: Rassegna stampa: prime pagine Gazzetta, Corriere e Tuttosport di martedì 7 novembre 2017
posts.text:
La Gazzetta dello Sport di oggi, martedì 7 novembre, apre con le parole del commissario tecnico Giampiero Ventura: “Mondiale ci saremo!”, in sette giorni l’Italia si gioca tutto contro la Svezia, ma c’è grande ottimismo. Di spalla, i conti dell'Inter’ investito mezzo miliardo, ma niente follie da parte di Suning. E ancora, spazio al Milan con Donnarumma decisivo e Bonucci che torna sui suoi livelli. Juve, la crisi di Dybala non preoccupa i bianconeri: col tempo l’argentino tornerà super.
“Giochiamola così”: il Corriere dello Sport anticipa i temi dello spareggio tra Italia e Svezia: l’andata è in programma venerdì a Stoccolma, il ritorno lunedì a San Siro. In falsa apertura, l’Inter che prepara un grande colpo di mercato: dal Paris Saint Germain può arrivare Pastore. In taglio basso, è una Juve d’acciaio anche grazie a Cuadrado: solo gol pesanti da parte del colombiano. Intanto, a New York c’è l’addio al calcio di Andrea Pirlo. E ancora il Napoli e i record di Sarri che supera anche Bianchi e Bigon. Il posticipo della Serie B: tra Perugia e Avellino finisce in parità, 1-1.
Tuttosport apre con “Juve ritrova la Joya”: i bianconeri attendono il rilancio di Paulo Dybala, all’orizzonte c’è un’altra sfida con Messi in Champions, sarà l’occasione per cancellare gli errori dal dischetto e il momento no? In taglio alto, la svolta toro in cinque mosse, mentre di spalla c’è spazio per il patto dei senatori del Milan per Montella. Più in basso, la nuova missione di Sarri per curare il Napoli stanco: portare le riserve al livello dei titolari. La svolta in casa Genoa: Ballardini si presenta, “qui per i tifosi”. 
20 Guarda la Galleria "Dries Mertens: le foto con il Napoli" 5 Guarda la Galleria "Daniele De Rossi: foto" 11 Guarda la Galleria "Foto: Roberto Mancini allo Zenit" 119 Guarda la Galleria "Foto: Gigi Buffon con la Nazionale" 7 Guarda la Galleria "Alessandro Florenzi: le foto" 4 Guarda la Galleria "Rassegna stampa sportiva | 7 novembre 2017" Rassegna stampa: prime pagine Gazzetta, Corriere e Tuttosport di martedì 7 novembre 2017 pubblicato su Calcioblog.it 07 novembre 2017 10:34.

Muscat Daily) Talented Manvi Sarawanan clinched a grand double at the ISC Open Table Tennis Tournament on Sunday when she won the girls U13 and women's singles titles. 
In the U13 final, Manvi beat Ishita Sharma 11-7, 11-3, 11-8, 11-6 while in the women's singles final, she rallied from two games down to edge past Aania Adap 6-11, 10-12, 11-8, 10-12, 13-11, 13-11, 12-10.

thread.title: Circumcision?
thread.title_full: Circumcision? | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: RavingRoo
posts.text: If you’re not doing it for medical reasons in the UK, and you don’t know anyone personally. you won’t be able to find a responsible trained medical professional to do it. Most of my Muslim / Jewish friends can rustle up a Muslim /Jewish medical professional amongst their extended family or friend circle with extensive circumcision experience. Even they wouldn’t be willing to do it for someone wanting it ‘just because’.

thread.title: 네네치킨이 7일 경쟁업체인 bhc에 대해 특허권를 침해했다며 소송을 제기했다. bhc의
thread.title_full: 네네치킨이 7일 경쟁업체인 bhc에 대해 특허권를 침해했다며 소송을 제기했다. bhc의

posts.author: CBS노컷뉴스 정영철 기자
posts.title: 네네치킨이 7일 경쟁업체인 bhc에 대해 특허권를 침해했다며 소송을 제기했다. bhc의
posts.text:
네네치킨이 7일 경쟁업체인 bhc에 대해 특허권를 침해했다며 소송을 제기했다. bhc의 인기제품인 '뿌링클' 치킨이 자사의 '스노윙' 치킨을 베꼈다는 것이다. 이에 bhc는 "근거 없는 주장"이라며 법적으로 대응하겠다며 발끈했다.
네네치킨은 이날 bhc의 '뿌링클' 치킨에 대해 해당 치킨의 폐기를 요구하는 특허권 침해 금지 청구 소장을 서울중앙지방법원에 제출했다고 밝혔다.
네네치킨은 2009년 스노윙 치킨을 출시하고 올 1월 '스노윙 치즈치킨 조리방법'을 국내에 특허 출원했다.
네네치킨은 소장에서 bhc의 뿌링클 치킨에 대한 성분 조사를 실시한 결과 총 18가지 성분 가운데 16개 원재료가 자사의 '스노윙 시즈닝(야채)' 성분과 동일하고, 나머지 2개 성분은 '스노윙 시즈닝(치즈)' 성분과 동일하다고 주장했다.
또 bhc측이 뿌링클 치킨이 국내 치즈 치킨의 원조라고 홍보하고 다른 업체들이 뿌링클 치킨을 따라 치즈맛 치킨 제품을 출시한 것처럼 사실을 호도했다는 점도 문제 삼았다.
네네치킨 관계자는 "식품업계에서는 신제품을 출시하기 위해 수많은 개발 착오를 겪으며 노력한 기업의 제품을 카피하고 마치 본인들이 원조인 것처럼 홍보하는 경우를 자주 볼 수 있다"며 "이에 대해 사회에 경종을 울릴 필요성이 있다고 판단해 소송을 진행하게 됐다"고 밝혔다.
이에 대해 bhc는 기업 이미지를 훼손했다며 '법적 대응'을 시사했다.
bhc도 보도 자료를 내고 "뿌링클은 bhc치킨 연구소가 개발한 bhc치킨만의 특화된 메뉴"라며 "뿌링클은 엄연히 bhc치킨만의 원료 배합과 제조방법으로 개발됐다. 뿌링클이 특허를 침해했다는 것은 상대방의 일방적인 주장일 뿐"이라고 맞대응했다.
성분이 겹친다는 네네치킨의 주장에 대해선 "제조 공법, 시즈닝 등에서 네네치킨하고 전혀 다르게 제조되고 있다"면서 "네네치킨 측의 스노윙 치즈치킨 조리방법은 올 1월2일 특허 등록됐고 bhc의 뿌링클은 2014년 11월 출시돼 제조방법 및 제품 콘셉트 등이 전혀 다르다"고 강조했다.
bhc 측은 "그동안 쌓아온 소비자와 가맹점과의 신뢰에 대해 씻을 수 없는 상처와 브랜드 이미지에 큰 훼손을 주었다"며 "일방적이고 전혀 근거가 없는 이번 소송에 대해서는 합리적이면서도 강력한 법적 대응을 하겠다"고 했다.
[CBS노컷뉴스 정영철 기자] steel@cbs.co.kr

thread.title: Sephora VIB Sale (Wishlist)
thread.title_full: Sephora VIB Sale (Wishlist)

posts.author: Ahn Kim (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Sephora VIB Sale (Wishlist)
posts.text:
Hi Guys! 
So...I know I said I was on a no buy until I make a nice dent in my sheet mask collection, but...the Sephora VIB sale is happening this week, Black Friday is not that far off and the holiday season is fast approaching. I mean I'll be good in the meantime, but I can't pass up the Sephora VIB sale and well Black Friday only happens once a year, so yeah...get ready for some hauls. 
Honestly though, I haven't really been buying that much this year. I mean it's been awhile since I last did a haul...I think it was in the spring? I know. Me and my excuses. Anywho, I don't know what exactly I will end up getting and obviously it would be crazy to get everything I wanted (I'm just not that rich to be doing so), but I figured I would share my Sephora wishlist with you guys...and if you see this post in time, help me narrow down my choices. 
I plan to make my purchase on Friday 11/10 or Saturday 11/11, so if you see this post before then, leave me a comment down below which of these you think I should get. Also, are any of you excited for the sale? Will you also be taking part? If so, also share in the comments below what you plan on purchasing, or have already purchased. I would love to know. 
Oh, and if you're shopping online like I am, don't forget to use Ebates to make your purchases. This is not a sponsored post or anything like that, they have no idea who I am, but I do just genuinely love using them to shop online because I get a percentage of my purchases back in cash, meaning I'm saving even more money, and who doesn't love saving money, right? It's super simple to sign up and use, so I definitely recommend checking it out. 
Like I already said, this not a sponsored post or anything like that, but I do have a referral link (a standard referral link they give to everyone who uses them, you will get one as well if you sign up). It will get you $10 cash back to start and me $25 for the referral, so if you'd like to get $10 and also help a girl out I would greatly appreciate you using this link to sign up: https://www.ebates.com/r/AHNINS2?eeid=28187 , BUT if you're not comfortable with that, that's totally fine and understandable and you can totally just go straight to their website here: https://www.ebates.com/index.htm to sign up. 
One tip though...don't have multiple windows open when checking out or it might not go through. That happened to me a couple times when I first started using it, which was a total bummer because I missed out on some nice cash back opportunities, so once you're ready to check out, just close any extraneous windows and once you just have your cart open, activate Ebates at that time and just use that one window to check out. 
Now on to my wishlist! My very long extensive wishlist that still doesn't cover everything I want... 
AMIKA  Polished Perfection Mini Straightening Brush http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k44/ WHY:  This isn't something that was not on my radar, but rather something I happened upon browsing through the Sephora website, and I was really drawn to it. I'm kind of getting sick and tired of using a straightener, so having the option to straighten my hair while just simply brushing it is really appealing...and I feel like since I'm not flat ironing, but rather brushing, it will maybe straighten whilst maintaining as much volume as possible? Since I'm not squishing my hair between two hot plates? And of course it also claims to preserve moisture for healthy hair and leave it silky smooth and shiny, so I'm all about that healthy, smooth and shiny hair life. 
There is a normal full sized straightening brush which is $120, which is pretty expensive, so I'm glad they have this mini version which is much cheaper. Judging from the reviews it appears that the mini may not be as great as the full sized version, especially since you can't control the temperature on the mini version like you can on the full sized version, but I don't have thick curly hair or anything like that, so I think this will be fine for me. 
While I didn't read every single review posted, the ones that I did peruse I found that people with wavy hair did seem to like it and it was those with thicker curly hair that didn't find it to be as strong/hot and good as the full sized, so I think the mini version will be fine for me. My hair is just a bit wavy, so I don't need anything heavy duty and since this is smaller and compact that means this will be travel friendly, which I like and prefer over a bigger bulkier hair tool. 
I'm pretty sure, like 99% sure, I will be purchasing this, so hopefully it works out for me as I envision it to and I love the results...and can retire my hair straightener. 
BELIF Holly Jolly Hydration Set http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k18/ 
WHY: I got a holiday gift set of Belif products last year (which I still haven't put up a review of, but it is coming) and I loved the True Cream Aqua Bomb that was in there. I thought this set had the full sized Aqua Bomb, but it's actually a full size of the other one, the True Cream Moisturizing Bomb, which I haven't tried. 
I wish it was a set including the full size of the Aqua Bomb, but I figured why not try the Moisturizing Bomb. This too has great reviews just like the Aqua Bomb and it's winter, so I figure now's the time to try the more heavy duty version. Plus, this also contains a deluxe sample of the expensive Hungarian Water Essence that I enjoyed and a nice sample of another of their eye creams that I haven't tried...and also, of course, it's got cute holiday packaging, so yeah...that's why I want it. 

BELIF Peat Miracle Revital Serum Concentrate http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k8p/ 
WHY:  I like the brand, I like the packaging and it has the word "miracle" in it. Anything that claims to be a miracle, I'm going to want to try...but it's pricey...like real pricey...like $60 for just 1oz of product pricey. 

BELIF The True Cream Aqua Bomb http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k1n/ WHY: Like I said above, I really enjoyed the Aqua Bomb that was included in my Belif set from last year and I want a full size of it to use. However, Sephora's VIB sale happens twice a year, so I may just wait until the Spring sale to get this since I think this is better suited for the hotter summer months (again full review is forthcoming). 
P.S. I would also get a full size of the Hungarian Water Essence, as spoiler alert I loved that as well, but it's expensive...$42 for just 75ml of product, which is half the size of a normal essence, although it does kind of act like a hybrid essence/serum and serums tends to be more expensive for less product, but I don't know. I do love it though...although the fact that I'm on the fence about it because of the price probably indicates that while I love it I don't love it enough. Have you guys tried the Hungarian Water Essence? Do you think it's worth the price? 


DIOR  Addict Lip Glow Color Reviver Balm in Berry http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k52/ WHY: I have been eyeing this product for a long while now, but haven't bought one because it's pricey...but I think I might finally go through with it and get one...in the shade Berry because I love berry shades...and if I'm gonna spend that much money on a lip balm I want one that's a little more noticeable and pigmented...even though it's just a sheer tint of color, the berry will probably be more apparent than the other shades. Also, it's not like it's an impulse purchase and I've been pinning over this for a couple years now, so I think it's time to just bite the bullet. 
DIOR  Capture Totale Dreamskin Advanced http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k8v/ WHY:  A skin perfector that gives you "Dreamskin" that's in pretty pink packaging? Yes, please...but again, so expensive. It's $150 for 1.7oz/50ml of product, so it'll probably be a pass for now but I do really want to try it...at some point. 
DR. JART+  Cicapair™ Tiger Grass Re.Pair Serum http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k9d/ 
WHY:  I often get a lot of redness in the cheek area and this is supposed to calm redness, so I would love to try it out and see if it actually works. Plus, I'm drawn to the packaging. I like this cute little green bottle with  a dropper. Also, I love the story behind it...the legend that they share in the product info. To read it, check out the "What else you need to know" section on the link above. 

ERBORIAN CC Crème High Definition Radiance Face Cream Skin Perfector http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k9f/ WHY: This is a brand that I've been interested in trying for awhile now, and with words like "skin perfector" and "radiance" in the name, of course I'm naturally going to be drawn to it. Plus I hear good things about this product, so I would love to try it out for myself. 


FENTY BEAUTY BY RIHANNA Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer 
http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k24/ WHY: While watching all the numerous Fenty review videos that poured out on YouTube when the brand first launched, the product that stood out to me the most that I really wanted to try was this Universal Gloss Bomb. The swatches were absolutely beautiful and it just spoke to me. Not that I need any more lip products, but yeah...I really want it...and probably will get it. 

GIVENCHY Noir Couture 4 in 1 Mascara 
http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k8t/ 

WHY:  I'm intrigued and drawn to the unique looking brush on this mascara, and I really want to give it a try...but do I really want to fork over $33 for a mascara? I'm torn. 
GLOW RECIPE  Blueberry Bounce Gentle Cleanser http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k9c/ WHY: Ever since Glow Recipe launched their own in-house products I've been wanting to try them, and this cleanser seems like an interesting and different/unique product. It's a foaming cleanser, but it can also double as a mask and apparently has this unique bouncy textured formula. I'm intrigued. 
GLOW RECIPE  Watermelon Glow Sleeping Mask http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k92/ WHY: Again, I've been eyeing and wanting to try the new in-house produced Glow Recipe products and so many people seem to love this one...at least that I've heard and I want to try it out for myself as well. It's got cute packaging, apparently it really does smell like watermelon, and apparently it really is an amazing awesome product, so I definitely want to and probably will get this product to try out. 
As for whether I get it from Sephora during the VIB sale or Glow Recipe during Black Friday I don't know. Last year, Glow Recipe gave 25% off all their products for Black Friday, so if they were to do that again that would mean 5% off more than the 20% that Sephora gives for the VIB sale, but what if I wait and it's sold out? This thing has sold out so many times on both Glow Recipe and Sephora it's ridiculous. Should I chance it? Although I would be using Ebates with my Sephora purchase so that could potentially even it out...although honestly it could very well sell out on Sephora anyways. Either way I'm going to do my best to get my hands on this one way or another this holiday season. 

HOURGLASS  Ambient Lighting Blush Collection in Mood Exposure http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k2t/ WHY:  The only Hourglass product that I've tried is the Ambient Lighting Powder in Diffused Light, which I don't think I've reviewed for you guys yet, but I really do enjoy and love it and Hourglass is known for their powders, so I really want to try one of their blushes as well...and of all the shades that they had, Mood Exposure was the shade that spoke to me the most...at least from what I could tell from the swatches I found online. I do want to try their bronzer and highlighter as well, but I want to try the blush first, then I'll probably try a bronzer next and a highlighter after that. 

LANEIGE Lip Sleeping Mask http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k5b/ 
WHY:  While I haven't tried this particular product, I do love Laneige and a lot of people love and swear by this lip mask, so I want to give it a go as well...especially now that the cold weather is upon us and my lips are starting to dry out. 
LAURA MERCIER  Almond Coconut Honey Bath http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k9m/ WHY: Honestly...packaging, and I love almond, coconut and honey. That's it. That's why I want this pricey $45 tub of honey bath. 

MILK MAKEUP Matcha Toner http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k5e/ WHY:  Milk is another brand that I've been wanting to try, and I'm really intrigued by the concept of this solid toner, which I haven't seen before, so I want to give it a go. 
PETER THOMAS ROTH  24K Gold Pure Luxury Lift & Firm Prism Cream http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k9k/ WHY:  I love me a nice radiant glow-y face, and this supposedly gives you that healthy beautiful lit from within glow...at least it claims it will, and I want that, so I want to give it a try. 

SEPHORA COLLECTION  Dark Rainbow Dual Boar Brush 
http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k5d/ WHY:  I have been wanting a dual boar brush for awhile now, though there wasn't any one in particular that I had my eye on, but then I saw this one which is cute and colorful and adorable and compact...so basically I want this because of the packaging. 

SK-II  Pitera Essence Set http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k5i/ WHY:  SK-II is a brand that has been at the top of my wishlist for awhile now, particularly the Facial Treatment Essence (which is the original that spawned dupes like the Missha First Treatment Essence that I absolutely love), but this brand is so expensive I just haven't taken the plunge yet...but then I saw that they had this set. 
It's still pricey, so I'm on the fence...but on the one hand, considering how expensive this brand is, this is a great set to dabble my feet in to and try out some of their products (and you do get more than the average deluxe sample size), but on the other hand this set still costs $99! 
With the 20% discount though that brings it down to like $79, and with Ebates I will get back a little bit more, so I think I may just bite the bullet and get it to finally try out the original that started it all...but what if I fall madly in love with it? Then I'm going to be hooked on a product that costs $179 for 160ml of product...but I guess that's a problem for my future self and not my present self. 
STILA Eye For Elegance Liquid Eye Shadow Set http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k8j/ WHY: These look absolutely gorgeous. The colors all seem to be colors that are up my alley and I love me some metallic and sparkly shine, so I really want this set in my makeup collection, but I don't know that I wear makeup often enough, and makeup that's not just a neutral "my face but better" makeup look, to make this purchase worthwhile, but I still want it nonetheless. I want that gorgeous metallic sparkle on my eyes! 
STILA  Written in the Stars Glitter & Glow Liquid Eye Shadow Set http://go.magik.ly/ml/7kbn/ WHY:  Oh my goodness...sparkles galore. This stuff is blinding, which is exactly how I want my sparkles to be. Don't know how much use I'll get out of such blinding metallic sparkles in my everyday life, but I still want it nonetheless...even more than the shadow set above, which is why this one's definitely going into my cart. 


TATCHA Luminous Dewy Skin Mist http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k5g/ 
WHY:  This is a cult favorite among many...well those that have dry skin, and I love me a nice healthy dewy glow on my face, so I want to experience this for myself. This is pricey though, as is the theme of this wishlist, so I'm glad they have a mini-size that I can try out first. Also, how beautiful and elegant is this packaging. 

TOM FORD Radiant Moisture Souffle http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k5n/ WHY: The name drew me in, and the description drew me in even further. This has one of my trigger words "radiant" in it's name and this product sounds like it would be right up my alley, so I really want to give it a try...only it's $98. 
I wish there was a mini version of this to try out first, but there isn't so I doubt I'll be getting this, especially if I do end up getting the SK-II set...that's just way too many luxury products to be getting in one sitting, but hopefully sometime down the line in the future I'll get the opportunity to try it...but for now I'll just have to continue pinning after it for who knows how long. 

TOUCH IN SOL  Metallist Liquid Foil & Glitter Double-Ended Eye Set http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k5k/ WHY: I want these for the same reason I want the Stila shadows above. I want these metallic and sparkly shadows on my eyes stat...and considering it's regularly $25 for one duo, this is a great deal to be able to try all 6 duos for just $40. 
I think the tubes may be a bit smaller than the regular duos, but not by much. I don't think there's really that much of a difference, but again just like what I said with the Stila set above, I don't know that I wear makeup enough or makeup that's not my usual neutral "my face but better" makeup to justify this purchase even if it is a great deal...but I've had my eyes on these for awhile now...ever since they first launched at Sephora...but I think I'll probably end up getting the Stila set and push this off for a later time.  It's too much to get both the Stila sets and this set and I think I'm drawn to the Stila shadows more than these...but let me know in the comments down below, which one you think I should get. 
URBAN DECAY  Naked Palette http://go.magik.ly/ml/7kau/ WHY:  This is like a staple palette that so many people love and have in their collection, and I want one for myself as well. But do I really need another palette? No, so I probably will hold off for now, but I do want to own one of my own at some point. 

YOUTH TO THE PEOPLE Age Prevention Superfood Serum http://go.magik.ly/ml/7k8o/ 
WHY:  I got a set containing a cleanser and moisturizer from Youth To The People last year:  https://ahninspired.blogspot.com/2017/05/youth-to-people-skincare.html  that I loved, so I want to check out more from the brand. The cleanser I wasn't a huge fan of until I tried it with my Foreo, and I still feel like it's too expensive for what it is...I feel like cleansers are a product you just don't need or should spend so much money on since they stay on your face for such a short period of time, but the moisturizer I absolutely loved, so I want to try more. 
Normally I would gravitate more towards a toner or essence to try, but since they don't have either of those, just a serum, I'm intrigued to try their serum. Also, I love the simple clear cut glass packaging. However, this thing is $62 for just 1oz of product, which is not a lot of product. That's expensive...even with the 20% off that's still expensive, so I don't know...I don't know if I'm ready to take that plunge yet, even though I do really want to try it. 
So that's it for now. There's of course more that I would love to buy and try even beyond this list, which doesn't even cover my Korean/Asian beauty wishlist, but this is more than enough products to contemplate about so I'm going to leave it at that. 
Stay tuned to see what I actually ended up buying, and again let me know in the comments down below what you think I should get and what you guys got if you also partook in the VIB sale. Until next time... 

FTC disclosure: This post contains affiliate links, which means I may receive a commission for purchases made through my links.

posts.text:
오늘 연합뉴스TV에서 [날씨] 큰 추위 없는 '입동'…차츰 전국 대부분 비라고 하는데, [날씨] 큰 추위 없는 '입동'…차츰 전국 대부분 비 네. 어느덧 겨울의 문턱입니다.
오늘 enews24에서 박효신 국빈공연, 트럼프 만난다..청와대가 '야생화' 택한 이유는?라고 하는데, 박효신 국빈공연 소식이 전해졌다.
세종시 연서면 토지에 대한 정보를 찾으시는 분들께는
정말 유용한 정보가 되는 것 같습니다.
보증금은 18,313,200원입니다.
소재지 :
관할법원 : 대전지방법원 경매3계
사건번호 : 2017타경 3437 (2)
감정가 : 183,132,000원
최저가 : (유찰0회) 183,132,000원
본 사건 권리분석 궁금하시면 2017타경 3437 함께 문의주십시오.
본건 토지 기호(3)의 공부상 지목은 "전"이나 [경매] , 현황 "과수원"으로 이용중이고, 기호(4)의 공부상 지목은 "전"이나, 현황 "축사부지 및 일부 과수원"으로 이용중임.
기호(3) 본건 북 [토지경매] 측으로 폭 약 3M내외의 포장도로에 접함. 기호(4),(9),(10) 일단의 형태로 북서측으로 차량 출입 가능한 출입로가 개설되어 있음.
본건까지 제반 차량의 진출입이 가능하고, 인 [경매] 근에 시내버스 정류장이 소재하는 등 제반 대중교통 여건은 보통임.
기호(5) : 주 [경매] 택 기호(6),(7) : 축사 기호(8) : 창고
별첨 “지적 및 건물개황 [경매] 도” 및 “사진용지”참조.
복숭아나무가 식 [토지경매] 재되어 있음.
기호(3) 부정형 평지이며, 과수원(복숭아나무 식재)으로 이용중이며, 일부 현황 도로임. 기호(4),(9) 부정형 평지이며, 2필 1단의 건부지로서 축사 등의 건물 부지 및 일부 과수원으로 이용중 [경매] 임. 기호(10) 사다리형의 평지이며, 창고시설부지로 이용중임.
기호(1),(2) 도시지역, 자연녹지지역, 자연취락지구(2016.03.02), [토지경매] 가축사육제한구역(전부제한구역)임.
기호(3) 생산관리지역, 기타용도지역지구기타(성장관리지역), 가축사육제한구역(전부제한구역)임. 기호(4),(9),(10) 계획관리지역, 기타용도지역지구기타(성장관리지역), 가축사육제 [경매] 한구역(전부제한구역), 하천구역(2014.12.10)임.
본건은 세종특별자치시 조치원읍 봉산리 소재 "조치원농협농산물유통센터" 남측 인근에 위치하며 [연서면경매] , 인근은 조치원읍소재지 근교에 위지한 과수원 및 농경지대로 제반 주위환경은 보통임.
감정평가금액 : 183,132,000원
최저매각가격 : 183,132,000원

posts.title: Africa:Johannesburg's Inner City - the Dubai of Southern Africa
posts.text:
Robbed At Gunpoint In My Bed In Johannesburg, South Africa published: 20 Oct 2017 Robbed At Gunpoint In My Bed In Johannesburg, South Africa Robbed At Gunpoint In My Bed In Johannesburg, South Africa published: 20 Oct 2017 views: 78 
I never thought I would wake up in bed to a gun at my face. I thought that sh*t only happens in the movies. I guess folks having electric fences and armed private security everywhere in Johannesburg was for a reason. And I guess that night, it was not enough. My bed is always my safe haven the most I ever worry about is a mosquito bothering me. Before I get into the details of the night, I want to share a lil’ about Joburg. I had a friend invite me out to SA and let me tell, you I had the time of my life, it was beautiful in Cape Town, where I was a few weeks prior. I travel the world to highlight the beauty in places that might not often be shown. I really want to show the world how beautiful Africa is as a continent. It is the blood that runs through my veins. Before I go any deeper, I just want say that Jo’burg is not all of Africa. After having a bullet land a couple feet away from my head in the armed robbery, I decided that I needed to look up some facts about Jo’burg haha. I don’t want to just talk about my personal experience because that would not be fair to an entire city. According to the Numeo website, Johannesburg makes the top ten on the list of the most crime-infested cities in the WORLD. Now that’s saying something. The thing is, we were very cautious as a team. Nobody in the crew wears anything fancy or flashy. We always check-out our surroundings because we know that we our camera gear we can become targets so we take extra precautions. thread.title: Tänavune Maarja küla heategevuskontsert jääb viimaseks
thread.title_full: Tänavune Maarja küla heategevuskontsert jääb viimaseks

posts.title: Tänavune Maarja küla heategevuskontsert jääb viimaseks
posts.text:
Eesti pikima heategevuskontsertide sarjas toimuvad tänavu viimased kontserdid, näitlejaid saab intellektipuudega noorte toetuseks laulmas kuulda veel eeloleval pühapäeval Tartus ja esmaspäeval Tallinnas. 
Tänavu laulavad näitlejad selle nimel, et Maarja küla saaks Kiidjärve metsade vahele parema internetiühenduse. 
"Igal asjal on oma aeg," nentis Maarja küla heategevuskontserdi "Kuula, palun! 15" peakorraldaja Anu Tonts Õhtulehele , lisades, et sarja viimane kontsert tuleb pidulik ja kurb. 
"Kontsert ise aga tuleb hästi vaheldusrikas ja meeleolukas, seda on juba praegu näitlejate valitud lauludest näha, on meeldejäävaid numbreid varasematelt kontsertidelt ja samas ka täiesti uusi lugusid, mida meie kontserdil varem lauldud pole," kirjeldas Tonts. Eriliseks teeb kontserdi seegi, et näitlejaid saadab sama saatebänd Toomas Lunge juhatusel, kes tegi seda esimesed kümme aastat. Toimetaja: Kerttu Kaldoja

thread.title: Check what Team India’s Mohammad Siraj did when he heard National Anthem on the ground.
thread.title_full: Check what Team India’s Mohammad Siraj did when he heard National Anthem on the ground.

posts.author: lotpotadmin
posts.title: Check what Team India’s Mohammad Siraj did when he heard National Anthem on the ground.
posts.text:
lotpotadmin Indian Cricket team , indian player , Mohammad siraj , national anthem of india 
Nationalism is something which is inherent in you. While we all are debating whether we should stand on National Anthem or not, while we are debating whether or not we should respect our National flag or not. Amidst this debate Something amazing has happened just two days back on the Cricket field. 
Where the representatives of the Muslim Community of India say that, “We don’t want to stand for the National Anthem as our religion doesn’t allow us to stand for it.” while on the other hand there are Muslims who are less vocal and those who carry India in their heart. So today we will make you meet one of those Muslims who has India in his heart. 
Mohammad Siraj is the son of an Auto Driver. He got selected for the first class cricket in 2015 and then in 2017 he got selected for IPL and in 2017 he got selected for Team India as well. He played his first match just two days back against New Zealand. 
When Ravi Shastri asked Mohammad Siraj to play that match he was overwhelmed. He wore the Indian Dress and then he stood with the teammates in a queue for the National Anthem. The moment he finished the National Anthem his tears burst out. Facebook Comments

thread.title: Meglepő, miből iszik legtöbbet a magyar
thread.title_full: Meglepő, miből iszik legtöbbet a magyar

posts.title: Meglepő, miből iszik legtöbbet a magyar
posts.text:
Meglepő, miből iszik legtöbbet a magyar 2017.11.07. 10:15 Magazin Több mint 80 milliárd forintot költ évente égetett szeszre a lakosság, a gyomorkeserűk kiskereskedelmi forgalma a vodkáénál és a pálinkáénál is erősebb. 
A Nielsen piackutató által mért kilenc égetett szeszes ital összesített kiskereskedelmi forgalma meghaladta a 80 milliárd forintot tavaly szeptember és idén augusztus között. Az égetett szeszek eladásának értékbeli megoszlásában 
26 százalékkal a gyomorkeserűk állnak az élen, 
megelőzve a vodkát (25) és a pálinkát (17) - írja a Világgazdaság. 
A vizsgált időszakban a gyomorkeserűk népszerűsége nőtt meg a leginkább, az értékesítésükből származó bevétel a 21 milliárd forintot is túllépte, egy évvel korábban még 19 milliárdot költött a lakosság gyomorkeserűkre. Több mint 44 ezer hektoliternyi fogyott ezekből a szeszes italokból, ami 7 százalékos növekedésnek felel meg. 
A 2500 négyzetméter feletti hipermarketekben fogy a legjobban a gyomorkeserű, az eladások 36 százalékát bonyolították le ezekben az üzletekben idén augusztusig. Éves összevetésben mégis az 50 négyzetméter alatti egységek produkálták a legnagyobb fejlődést, részesedésük 17-ről 21 százalékra emelkedett. 
A félliteres változat a legkelendőbb, a karácsonyi időszakban viszont a hét deciliteresek felé tolódik a kereslet. A kategóriában töretlen, 91 százalékos a gyártói márkák aránya, a kereskedelmi márkáknak be kell érniük a fennmaradó kilenc százalékkal. 
Az Egészségügyi Világszervezet felmérése szerint az éves hazai alkoholfogyasztás 12,3 liter fejenként. Ha máskor is tudni szeretne hasonló hírekről, vagy elmondaná a véleményét, lájkolja az InfoRádió Facebook-oldalát! Iratkozzon fel hírlevelünkre, hogy értesüljön a legjelentősebb hírekről. Melyik időpontban szeretné megkapni?

thread.title: Circumcision?
thread.title_full: Circumcision? | Mumsnet Discussion

posts.author: DumbledoresPensieve
posts.text:
No, no and no again unless it's for a medical reason and done under anaesthetic. I don't think you'd get it done on the NHS anyway unless it was needed .
Please don't OP. Having a foreskin doesn't spread infection! Most men in the U.K. aren't circumcised.
Why can't you compare it to FGM? FGM is where a little girl gets a bit of her genitalia sliced off. So is circumcision. It's barbaric.
You may well find when baby is born you can't bear the thought of anything causing him pain. When my DS arrived and had to have the heel prick test that all babies have at a few days old I couldn't bear to hold him for it and wanted to thump the lady who stuck a needle in his little foot and (momentarily) hurt him. Irrational, obviously and I didn't say a word, just winced but I couldn't bear it. Vaccinations I was the same, absolutely necessary but I hated them. Wanted to rip the needle off the nurse every time! I can't imagine talking my baby in for something that is exceptionally painful and completely unnecessary.

posts.author: Gowtham
posts.title: *தாய்க்கும் மகனுக்குமான ஓர் உரையாடல்;-*
posts.text:
*தாய்க்கும் மகனுக்குமான ஓர் உரையாடல்;-* On By Gowtham In Tamil spiritual 
“அம்மா நான் ஒரு மரபணு விஞ்ஞானி! 
நான் யூஎஸ் சில் மனிதனின் பரிணாம வளர்ச்சியைப் பற்றிய விஞ்ஞானத்துறையில் வேலை பார்க்கிறேன். 
சார்லஸ் டார்வினின் பரிணாம வளர்ச்சி கோட்பாடு! அவரைப் பற்றி கேள்விப் பட்டிருக்கிறீர்களா அம்மா?”- வாசு. அவனது அம்மா புன்னகைத்தவாறே அவனது அருகில் அமர்கிறாள். *”எனக்கு டார்வின் பற்றி தெரியும் வாசு! ஆனால் நீ #தசாவதாரம் பற்றி கேள்விப்பட்டிருக்கிறாயா?* விஷ்ணுவின் பத்து அவதாரங்கள்?” வாசு இல்லையென பதிலளிக்கிறான்.“அப்படியென்றால் உனக்கும் Mr.டார்வினுக்கும் தெரியாத ஒன்றை இப்போது கூறுகிறேன். கவனமாகக் கேள்.” என்று கூறியபடி தொடங்கினாள். *”#முதல்_அவதாரம்_மத்ஸ்ய #மச்ச) #அவதாரம்.* அதன் பொருள் மீன்.உயிரினங்கள் நீரிலேயே முதன் முதலில் தோன்றின! சரிதானே!” 
வாசு கூடுதல் கவனத்துடன் கேட்க ஆரம்பிக்கிறான். அதன் பின் வருவது *கூர்ம அவதாரம்* அதன் பொருள் ஆமை! 
ஏனென்றால் பரிணாம வளர்ச்சியில் உயிரினங்கள் நீரிலிருந்து நிலத்திற்கு வருகின்றன! Amphibians.எனவே ஆமை இனம் நீரிலும் நிலத்திலும் வாழும் உயிரினங்களைக் குறிக்கிறது! மூன்றாவதாக வருவது *காட்டுப்பன்றி வராக அவதாரம்* 
இதுல அறிவாற்றல் அதிகம் இல்லாத காட்டு விலங்குகளைக் குறிக்கும். நீங்கள் டைனோசர் என்று கூறிடும் விலங்கைப் போல்.சரியா?” 
வாசு விரிந்த கண்களுடன் தலையை ஆட்டினான். *நான்காவது அவதாரம நரசிம்ம அவதாரம்* அது பாதி மனிதனும் பாதி விலங்குமாய், பரிணாம வளர்ச்சியில் காட்டுவிலங்குகளிருந்து சற்றே மேம்பட்ட அறிவாற்றலை உடைய உயிரினத்தின் வளர்ச்சியைக் குறிப்பது!” *ஐந்தாவது வாமன அவதாரம்* 
குற்றம் அல்லது நடுத்தரமான உண்மையில் வளர சாத்தியக்கூறுகளை உடைய உயிரினம்.ஏன் தெரியுமா? 
உண்மையில் மனிதரில் இரண்டு வகை! 
Homo Erectus ஆதி மனிதன்; Homo sapiens 
தற்கால மனிதன். பரிணாம வளர்ச்சியில் வெற்றி பெற்ற முழுமையான அறிவாற்றல் பெற்றவர்கள்.” 
வாசு பிரமித்துப் போய் தன் அம்மாவின் பேச்சைக் கேட்டிருந்தான். *ஆறாவது அவதாரம் பரசுராமன்* இது கோடாலி போன்ற ஆயுதங்களைக் கையாளத் தெரிந்த, ஒரு மூர்க்கமான கோபமுடைய, வனம் மற்றும் குகைவாசி! *ஏழாவது அவதாரம் ராமன்* முதல் சிந்திக்கும் அறிவாற்றல் மேம்பட்ட மனித இனத்தைக் குறிப்பது! 
சமூக விதிகள், உறவுகளின் அடிப்படை ஆகியவற்றை எடுத்துக்காட்டியது அவதாரம். *எட்டாவது அவதாரம் பலராமர் அவதாரம்* உண்மையான விவசாய நலன் அறிந்த, வாழ்வில் அதன் முக்கியத்துவத்தை எடுத்துக்காட்டும் அவதாரம்! 
உடல் பலம் கூடி மூர்க்கத்தனம் இல்லாத 
விவசாயத்தைக்காப்பதோடு, மல்யுத்தம் முதலியவற்றில் நிபுணராகத் திகழ்ந்தது! *ஒன்பதாவது அவதாரம் கிருஷ்ணர்* நல்ல அரசனாகவும், அரசியல் தந்திரங்களில் தேர்ந்தவனாகவும், சமூகத்திற்கு காதல் வாழ்க்கையின் நெறிகளைப் போதிப்பவனாகவும் வாழ்ந்து மனிதனைச் இனம் செழித்து வாழ வகைகளைக் காட்டிய அவதாரம். 
மனிதன் தன் நற்பண்புகளாலும், குணங்களாலும் அரசனாகி புகழுடன் ஆட்சி செய்து அரசியல் தந்திரங்களில் நிபுணனாகி தெய்வமாக வணங்கப்படும் நிலைக்கு உயர்வதென்பது கிருஷ்ண அவதாரமாக உள்ளது.“கடைசியாக 
*கல்கி அவதாரம்* உள்ளது! 
நீங்கள் உங்களது ஆராய்ச்சியில் எதிர்பார்த்துக் கொண்டிருக்கும் ஒரு அற்புத சக்திகளைக் கொண்ட அவதாரம். 
மரபணுவில் உயர்ந்த ஓர் அவதாரம்! வாசு. எதுவும் பேச முடியாமல் தாயைப் பார்க்கிறான். 
“அற்புதமான தகவல் அம்மா? எப்படி இவ்வாறு நீங்கள் சிந்தித்திருக்கிறீர்கள்?” 
“ஆம் வாசு! இதுதான் உண்மை! *இந்தியர்கள் நம் முன்னோர் பல அற்புதமான உண்மைகளை அறிந்தே வைத்திருந்தனர்*.ஆனால் விஞ்ஞானம் என்ற பெயரிட்டு அதை அடுத்த தலைமுறைக்கு எடுத்துச் செல்லத் தெரியாமல், புராணக் கதைகளாகக் கூறி வந்தனர். *புராணங்கள் அர்த்தமுள்ளவை!* 
நாம் பார்க்கும் விதம்தான். எல்லாம்! புராணங்களோ, விஞ்ஞானமோ. நீங்கள் வைக்கும் பெயர்.உண்மை எல்லாம்ஒன்றே! *மச்ச, கூர்ம, வராக, நரசிம்ம அவதாரங்கள் மிருகங்களின் வெவ்வேறு நிலைகளையும் இதர அவதாரங்கள் மனித வளர்ச்சியின் வெவ்வேறு நிலைகளையும் சித்தரிக்கின்றன என்பது புரிகிறதா? இதனால்தான் தசாவதாரம்தான் டார்வின் கொள்கைக்கு முன்னோடி என்று சொல்லப்படுகிறது* Share this:

thread.title: 新闻早班车（20171107）：发售仅三天iPhone X跌破官网价 或因供过于求
thread.title_full: 新闻早班车（20171107）：发售仅三天iPhone X跌破官网价 或因供过于求

posts.title: 新闻早班车（20171107）：发售仅三天iPhone X跌破官网价 或因供过于求
posts.text:
新闻早班车（20171107）：发售仅三天iPhone X跌破官网价 或因供过于求 
刘昫呈 2017-11-07 13:24 
（本篇内容评论由微软小冰机器人提供） 
时事 
【变相“首付贷”形式隐蔽风险高 新一轮监管将严查】 住建部近日会同人民银行、银监会联合部署规范购房融资行为，明确严禁房地产开发企业、房地产中介机构违规提供购房首付融资；严禁互联网金融从业机构、小额贷款公司违规提供“首付贷”等购房融资产品或服务；严禁房地产中介机构、互联网金融从业机构、小额贷款公司违规提供房地产场外配资；严禁个人综合消费贷款等资金挪用于购房。这是近期多个中央和地方监管部门严查资金违规流入楼市的一个缩影。此前，多地银监部门已经行动起来，严查消费贷款资金被挪用于支付购房首付款。（经济参考报） 
小冰：越是隐蔽的错误，危害性越大，就越要尽早解决。 
科技 
【发售仅三天iPhone X跌破官网价 或因供过于求】 继iPhone 8在发售一小时就跌破发售价后，苹果把希望都寄托在了iPhone X身上。但iPhone X的价格也并不坚挺。11月4日，就在苹果iPhone X正式发售的第二天，渠道商的报价已经跌破官网价格，银色iPhone X(64GB)报价8150元，低于官网价格150余元，更是比刚刚发售时的黄牛价暴跌1600余元。业内专家认为，降价的直接原因就是“供过于求”。（新京报） 
小冰：只有不断的创新，超越自我，才能得到市场和消费者的认可和青睐。 
【新增硕博点名单公布】 根据国务院学位委员会的相关文件要求，各省教育部门需在10月31日前，将新增博士硕士学位点推荐名单报送至国务院学位委员会办公室。目前已有多个省份的教育部门在官方网站上公示了推荐名单。从各省公布的名单来看，大部分省份上报审核的新增硕士博士学位授权点都数以百计，申报总量创历史新高。其中，硕士学位是新增学位授权审核名单中的主体，专硕占比大幅度提升。（经济观察网） 
小冰：教育是立国之本，知识是推动社会进步的重要力量 。 
地产 
【中粮抛售长安街W酒店】 10月31日，中粮酒店（北京）有限公司正式在上海联合产权交易所挂牌转让其100%股权，该公司为大悦城地产旗下公司，主要运营资产是名噪一时的长安街W酒店。对此，大悦城地产官方回应称，“酒店业务是大悦城地产旗下重要的业务组成，在当前市场环境下，与其他业态相比，酒店投资回报率相对较低，难以满足国资委对央企的要求。针对此，公司按照国资委要求，并结合自身发展战略，调整整体资产结构，对业绩增长相对缓慢的北京长安街W酒店予以出售。”（经济观察网） 
小冰：多一些调整和修正，少一些僵硬和顽固，才能走的更远。 
汽车 
【神龙汽车多举措提振销量效果不佳 被曝工厂"出借"】 神龙汽车的寒冬仍在继续。数据显示，今年前9个月，神龙汽车累计销量为23.52万辆，同比下滑42.22%，仅完成之前70万辆年销量目标的33.6%。面对如此现状，神龙汽车于近日宣布下调年度销量目标至40.2万辆。与此同时，神龙汽车确立了“重回赛道”三大核心目标，其中包括要在2020年销量实现70万辆以上。此外，神龙汽车下属东风标致、东风雪铁龙两大品牌的人事调整也在继续。事实上，神龙汽车今年以来推出多项举措，希望能够挽救持续下滑的销量和市场困境，但从目前情况来看收效不佳。（新京报） 
小冰：如果能够早点预见困难，也不至于在困难来临时被打的措手不及。 
【能源、金融等行业的美国企业家8日将随特朗普访华】 11月8日至10日，美国总统特朗普将对中国进行国事访问，多位美国企业家将随特朗普访华，从目前被披露的访华团名单来看，高管遍布于能源、工业和材料、科技、生命科学、金融、农业和贸易等行业。初步统计，能源与材料行业随行的企业高管人数较多。（财联社） 
小冰：合作共赢是这个世界永远的主题。 
【英国宣布加息，超宽松货币政策走向终结】 在11月2日结束的货币政策会议上，英国央行宣布加息25个基点，从目前0.25%的历史低位提高到0.5%，这也是英国央行10年来的首次加息。自此，英国央行成为美联储、欧洲央行之后第三个退出宽松政策的主要发达经济体央行。但是，这次加息对于买买买的中国人来说并不是好事，利率提高除了可能提升英镑的价值外，也意味着融资成本的上升。（ 网易财经 ） 
小冰：一项政策的出台在惠及一部分人的同时，也会损害一部分人的利益。

thread.title: An Arizona Christmas
thread.title_full: An Arizona Christmas

posts.author: Steve M (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: An Arizona Christmas
posts.text:
By William W. Johnstone with J.A. Johnstone Pinnacle, November 2017 
Like most families, the Jensens gather together to celebrate the holidays. This year, since half the clan is scattered across the American West, they've decided to split the difference and meet up in Tucson. Matt and Luke will be there, for sure, and maybe Ace and Chance, too. That leaves Sally, Preacher, and Smoke Jensen, who've reserved three seats on a westbound stage to make sure they don't miss out on the festivities. What could possibly go wrong?  
Mother Nature is the first to strike, dusting up the trail with a sandstorm as blinding and deadly as any northern blizzard. Then comes an Apache ambush, forcing the passengers and drivers to seek shelter in a cave. Even if Smoke and Preacher manage to shoot their way out of this, they have another big surprise waiting--a ruthless gang of outlaws after the cargo of cash on the stage, happy to slaughter anyone who tries to stop them. If the Jensens hope to save Christmas this year, they'll need to save their own lives first . . . 
The seventh Johnstone book set at Christmas and the first one I’ve read. Great to see the author bringing together some of the Johnstone’s greatest characters but as expected the trail to their Christmas rendezvous doesn’t run smoothly. 
Most of the story concentrates on the dangers facing Smoke, Sally and Preacher as they journey together first by train and then stagecoach, and it’s whilst travelling on the latter that most of this tale revolves. The stage is also filled with a number of interesting characters too and the author often switches between them as well as those attempting to stop one of them reaching Tucson. 
With outlaws, Apaches, and Mother Nature out to destroy the stagecoach and its passengers the book offers plenty of action and there is an impressive body count. Once the travellers are pinned down in a cave the tension mounts as you’ll be wondering just how they can possibly escape. 
One thing I particularly enjoyed was the names of some of the characters, Ballard and Tuttle for instance which many long-time readers of westerns will recognize as past authors of the genre. A nod to those old time pulps which is strengthened by the comments in the last part of the story about newspaper reporters and writing for those pulps. 
If you’re looking for a fast read that is packed with gunplay then this is certainly worth adding to your ‘want to read’ list.

posts.title: Conferência para o clima da ONU inaugurada em Bonn com apelo à defesa do Acordo de Paris
posts.text:
Conferência para o clima da ONU inaugurada em Bonn com apelo à defesa do Acordo de Paris Fonte: Diário do Povo Online 07.11.2017 15h36 
BONN, 7 de nov (Diário do Povo Online) – A 23ª Conferência de Partes (COP 23) para a Convenção-Quadro das Nações Unidas sobre a Mudança do Clima (UNFCCC) foi inaugurada nesta última segunda-feira (5) em Bonn, na Alemanha, com um apelo à persistência nos pressupostos do Acordo de Paris. 
Na cerimônia de abertura da COP 23, a secretária executiva para as mudanças climáticas da ONU, Patricia Espinosa, disse que, “com a Agenda de Desenvolvimento Sustentável, temos um caminho claro para abordar verdadeiramente as mudanças climáticas e o desenvolvimento sustentável.” 
Segundo Espinosa, o objetivo mais importante é a adoção de novas medidas essenciais para garantir que o sistema operacional do Acordo de Paris seja concluído a tempo e que as formas de o implementar sejam reforçadas. 
O representante especial chinês sobre as mudanças climáticas, Xie Zhenhua, disse em uma coletiva de imprensa realizada antes da COP 23 que a China espera que os participantes possam elaborar um rascunho de orientação que reflita sobre as necessidades de todas as partes e de todos os elementos importantes no Acordo de Paris. 
Em uma coletiva de imprensa realizada pela delegação chinesa na segunda-feira em Bonn, Lu Xinming, um negociador da Comissão Nacional de Desenvolvimento e Reforma (NDRC), afirmou que a China apresentou cinco propostas para a conferência sobre a concretização do Acordo de Paris, demonstrando “uma atitude proativa em participar e orientar as negociações climáticas globais”. 
De acordo com o comunicado de imprensa da COP 23, os negociadores irão também discutir outros assuntos, incluindo o progresso de entrega do apoio de 100 bilhões de dólares aos países em desenvolvimento até 2020 e a realização da Alteração de Doha do Protocolo de Quioto, o primeiro tratado internacional para a redução de emissões.

thread.title: Renault launches Captur
thread.title_full: Renault launches Captur

posts.author: Rohit Dabrai (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Renault launches Captur
posts.text:
French carmaker Renault launched Captur, its third offering in the utility vehicle segment in the domestic market. Going by the performance of the its existing products – Kwid and Duster – Captur has hit the market at the right time to help Renault recover lost volumes. Renault was one of the first manufacturers to create the compact SUV space in the market with the launch of the Duster in 2012 and the vehicle immediately became popular with buyers. However, due to stiff competition from other competitors, volumes declined in the last two financial years. In FY17, volumes increased by 5% to 18,947 units while in FY16, the same for the vehicle declined 54% to 18,045 units compared to the previous fiscal. In the first six months of the current fiscal, volumes have slumped by 20.3% y-o-y to 8,074 units.

During the festival season in FY16, the company had launched Kwid – the first small car by the manufacturer – and for a year-and-a-half, volumes picked up and touched 10,000 units per month, but cooled off later. Kwid was the only new offering from any manufacturer in the mini or ‘A’ segment when the rest of the manufacturers were focusing on segments such as compact SUV and premium hatchback.

In FY16, Renault had sold 41,204 units of Kwid and in the following fiscal, volumes increased by a whopping 165.3% to 1,09,341 units. In the first six months of the current fiscal (April to September), volumes decreased by 20.12% to 44,757 units.

The Captur is based on the ‘MO’ platform on which the Duster is based, but it will be more premium than the Duster. It will compete with the likes of Hyundai Creta and Nissan Terrano as the segment has not witnessed any new launch for quite some time. So, Renault will have the opportunity to create some space for itself with Captur.

With most of the volume growth in the passenger vehicle market coming from the utility vehicle segment, Renault can be hopeful of increasing its overall volumes with the Captur.

Global Medical Imaging Market: Overview 
Medical imaging is a process of creating visual representations of internal parts of the body for medical intervention along with clinical analysis. It assists in diagnosing and treating the diseases properly. It installs a database of physiology and normal anatomy thus making it feasible to recognize the abnormalities. It is part of biological imaging coupled with radiology, which includes imaging technologies of endoscopy, X-ray radiography, ultrasound, tactile imaging, magnetic resonance imaging, elastography, medical photography, and others. 
Request Free Sample Report @ https://www.zionmarketresearch.com/sample/medical-imaging-market 
Global Medical Imaging Market: Growth Factors 
Key market manufacturers are highly investing on the R&D activities coupled with rising government initiatives; these are some of the factors that are contributing to the growth of the market. Increasing demand for portable imaging equipment and growing preferences toward refurbished equipment anticipate fueling the market growth. It is useful in diagnosing complex medical conditions; this is expected to augment the market growth. The radiologist extensively adopts medical imaging, as it is free from any harmful rays. Companies show their interest for the manufacturing of nuclear imaging equipment, which is propelling the market. Chronic diseases such as cardiovascular diseases, cancer, and others require medical imaging in order to provide early diagnosis of the disease; this will positively enhance the market in the coming years. Increasing demand for medical imaging leads to rising number of imaging equipment such as SPECT/PET equipment, MRI, ultrasound systems, CT Scanners, and X-ray systems. 
Global Medical Imaging Market: Segmentation 
The medical imaging market is segregated on the basis of application, product, and region. Based on the application, the market is divided into community health services, hospitals, research institutes, physical examination institutions, clinics, and others. The market is classified on the basis of the product as nuclear imaging equipment, computed tomography scanners, X-ray devices, ultrasound systems, digital imaging, and magnetic resonance imaging. Region-wise, the medical imaging market is diversified into Europe, North America, Asia-Pacific, Latin America, and the Middle East & Africa.

Global Medical Imaging Market: Regional Analysis 
Asia Pacific is expected to be the most attractive market for the growth of medical imaging industry. Rising population, the disposable income of the people, and growing affordability of patients to avail imaging facilities are the major factors that are responsible for the medical imaging market growth. The government in countries such as China and Malaysia are taking initiatives for the establishment of the improved medical infrastructure and imaging equipment thus expecting to drive the market in future. Technologically advanced imaging equipment are getting launched in the market, which is expected to open up a new avenue in the North American market. Market players are focusing on adopting mergers & acquisitions, strategic collaborations that will foster the market in the Middle East and Africa, and they are also enhancing their expertise by improving their geographical presence. 
Global Medical Imaging Market: Competitive Players 
Major leading players in the global medical imaging market are Shimadzu Corporation, Fujifilm Holdings Corporation, Philips Healthcare, GE Healthcare, Fonar Corporation, Samsung Medison, and HOYA Group PENTAX. thread.title: Kuidas on oktoobripöörde tähendus 100 aasta jooksul muutunud?

posts.title: Kuidas on oktoobripöörde tähendus 100 aasta jooksul muutunud?
posts.text:
Välismaa 
Täna möödub 100 aastat oktoobripöördest ehk nagu teda pikalt ametlikult nimetati – Suurest Sotsialistlikust Oktoobrirevolutsioonist. Uku Toom tuletab meelde, kuidas selle tähendus 100 aasta jooksul muutunud on. 
Oktoobrirevolutsiooni aastapäeva on aegade jooksul tähistatud erinevalt. Esialgu oli revolutsiooniline vaimustus, siis muutus see lihtsalt rahvapühaks, mida ilmestas paraad. Pikapeale muutus see paraad kohustuseks, kus pidi sunniviisil osalema, muidu tekkisid tööl ebameeldivused. Kõik see puudutas perioodil 1940–90 ka Eestit, aga põhisündmused, nagu ka 1917. aastal, toimusid siiski Venemaal ja Moskvas, sest seal toimuv oli kogu riigi tähelepanu all. 
Kui toimusid suured muutused, lagunes NSV Liit, keelati kommunistlik partei, võeti maha Lenini kujusid, oli selge, et oktoobrirevolutsiooni aastapäeva enam endiselt tähistada ei saa. Esialgu võeti ära teine puhkepäev – 8. november. Paar aastat hiljem, 1995. aastal kirjutas president Boriss Jeltsin alla seaduse Venemaa sõjalise kuulsuse päevadest, milles 7. november nimetati Moskva vabastamise päevaks Kuzma Minini ja Dmitri Pozarski juhitud rahvaväe poolt 1612. aastal. Järgmisel aastal anti peopäevale uus nimi – den soglasia i primirenija – üksmeele ja leppimise päev. 2004. aastal tegi president Putin uue muudatuse – rahvusliku ühtsuse ja poolakate üle saavutatud võidu päevaks kuulutati 4. november, mis muudeti ka puhkepäevaks. 
Aga 7. novembrist päris loobuda ka ei suudetud – see päev jäi sõjalise kuulsuse päevaks, aga see sõjaline saavutus on nüüd Isamaasõja ajal 1941. aastal Punasel väljakul toimunud sõjaväeparaad, kust sõjaväeosad sisuliselt otse rindele läksid ja aitasid tagasi lüüa saksa vägede pealetungi Moskvale. 
Sel aastal tähistati Venemaal 4. novembrit tavapäraselt. Putin ja patriarh Kirill panid lilled Minini ja Požarski mälestussamba juurde, erinevates kohtades toimusid rahvapidustused. Mis puutub tänasesse päeva, 7. novembrisse, siis muutuvad venemaalased sellesse suhtumises üha ükskõiksemaks. Levada keskuse andmetel peavad plaani seda päeva tähistada alla 20 protsendi küsitletutest. Kui Putini pressiesindajalt Dmitri Peskovilt paar nädalat tagasi küsiti, kuidas kavatseb Kreml seda päeva ehk 100 aasta möödumist oktoobrirevolutsioonist tähistada, teatas Peskov, et võimud ei näe mingit põhjust pidutsemiseks. Samas on Putin kutsunud rahvast oktoobrirevolutsiooni sajandaks aastapäevaks unustama lõhed , mida revolutsioon kunagi esile kutsus. Sest kui Putin on kutsunud sajandi suurimaks katastroofiks Nõukogude liidu lagunemist, siis on hoopis rohkem neid, kes on sajandi suurimaks katastroofiks nimetanud oktoobrirevolutsiooni. 
"Terevisioonis" käis täna oktoobripöördest rääkimas ka David Vseviov. Vt videot eespool. Toimetaja: Merit Maarits

posts.author: info@tabnak.ir
posts.title: استقبال پنتاگون از ادعاهای عربستان علیه ایران
posts.text: 07 November 2017 امتیاز خبر: 84   3235 وزارت دفاع آمریکا از ادعاهای عربستان درباره نقش ایران در یمن و حمله موشکی حوثی‌ها به ریاض استقبال کرد.به گزارش ایسنا به نقل از خبرگزاری رویترز، آدریان رانکین گالووی سخنگوی پنتاگون از ادعاهای روز دوشنبه مقامات عربستان سعودی درباره نقش ایران در یمن و اینکه تهران موشک‌های حوثی‌ها برای حمله به ریاض پایتخت عربستان را تامین کرده است، استقبال کرد.وی گفت: ما به حفظ روابط دفاعی قوی با پادشاهی عربستان ادامه می‌دهیم و در خصوص اولویت‌های امنیتی مشترک‌مان شامل مقابله با سازمان‌های افراط‌گرای خشونت‌آمیز و مقابله با نفوذ ایران در منطقه خاورمیانه ادامه می‌دهیم.بر اساس این گزارش، مقامات سعودی روز شنبه اعلام کردند که نیروهای حوثی در یمن یک حمله موشکی به فرودگاه بین‌المللی ریاض انجام داده‌اند که سامانه ضدموشکی عربستان آن را رهگیری و منهدم کرده است.مقامات عربستانی و آمریکایی مدعی شدند که مسئولیت این حمله متوجه ایران است.به گزارش ایسنا، این ادعاها در حالی مطرح می شود که امیر حاتمی وزیر دفاع کشورمان گفت: دشمن از هر فرصتی برای اتهام زنی علیه ایران استفاده می کند و قطعا ما این مسئله را رد می کنیم.وزیر دفاع ادامه داد: بنا نیست هر اتفاقی در منطقه رخ می‌دهد، ایران را متهم کنند البته این موارد از دشمن بعید نیست.همچنین عزیز جعفری فرمانده سپاه پاسداران در واکنش به این ادعاها تاکید کرد: ما امکان انتقال موشک به آنجا (یمن) را نداریم و موشک‌ها برای خودشان است که بازسازی و برد آن را زیاد کرده‌اند و بدین وسیله انتقام خون شهدای مظلوم یمن را گرفته‌اند.

thread.title_full: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) CLINICAL ASST PROF

posts.title: (USA-MI-Ann Arbor) CLINICAL ASST PROF
posts.text:
University of Michigan CLINICAL ASST PROF in Ann Arbor , Michigan 
How to Apply 
Interested parties may send CV and a letter of interest to: Edward A. Hurvitz, M.D., Professor and Chair, Department of PM&R, 325 E. Eisenhower Pkwy, Ann Arbor, MI 48108 or via email to amckeigh@med.umich.edu 
Job Summary 
The Department of Physical Medicine and Rehabilitation is seeking a board qualified or board eligible physiatrist for an academic faculty position in its premier Spine Program. Primary duties will be to provide excellent patient care in the management of acute, subacute, and chronic spine conditions including the performance of fluoroscopically guided spinal injections. The position also involves teaching fellows, residents, and students, and collaboration on research projects. 
Required Qualifications* 
MD or DO degree and must have completed an accredited physical medicine and rehabilitation residency program and an interventional spine or pain fellowship, and be board qualified or board eligible. Must hold or be able to obtain the appropriate medical licenses in the State of Michigan. Evidence of clinical competence and competence in clinical and didactic teaching is expected. 
Underfill Statement 
This position is posted as clinical instructor/clinical assistant professor/clinical associate professor/clinical professor. Faculty rank and salary will be commensurate with credentials. 
Background Screening 
University of Michigan Health System conducts background screening and pre-employment drug testing on job candidates upon acceptance of a contingent job offer and may use a third party administrator to conduct background screenings. Background screenings are performed in compliance with the Fair Credit Report Act. 
U-M EEO/AA Statement 
The University of Michigan is an equal opportunity/affirmative action employer.

posts.author: 하이거
posts.title: 해외 한국어 방송인들 한자리에 모인다-2017년 해외 한국어방송인 대회 및 초청 연수교육 개최
posts.text:
해외 한국어 방송인들 한자리에 모인다 -2017 년 해외 한국어방송인 대회 및 초청 연수교육 개최
작성일 : 2017. 11. 7. 방송콘텐츠진흥팀
해외 한국어 방송인들 한자리에 모인다.
- 7개국 36개 한국어 방송사 모여, 해외 한국어 방송상 시상, 국내 방송사와의 협력방안 논의 -
□ 과학기술정보통신부(장관 유영민, 이하 ‘과기정통부’)는 ‘2017년 해외 한국어방송인 대회 및 초청 연수교육’을 11월 7일(화)부터 9일(목)까지 3일간 상암동 스탠포드 호텔, 평창 등지에서 개최한다고 밝혔다.
□ 해외 한국어 방송인 대회는 매년 해외에서 우리말 방송사를 운영하는 방송인들을 초청 격려하고, 국내 방송사와의 교류 및 발전방안 등을 모색하는 행사로, 지난 1995년 시작된 이래 올해로 23번째를 맞이하고 있다.
 ※ 해외 한국어 방송사 현황 : 12개국 88개 방송사(TV 46개, 라디오 29개, TV+라디오 13개)
 ㅇ 이번 행사에는 7개국* 36개 해외 한국어 방송사 관계자 60여명이 참가하여 해외 한국어 방송상 시상, 글로벌 네트워크 구축 워크숍 및 세미나, 최신 방송제작기술 연수교육 등으로 진행된다.
 * 미국, 중국, 호주, 뉴질랜드, 인도네시아, 몽골, 케냐
□ 대회 첫날인 7일(화) 개회식에서는, 지난 1년간 한국어방송사가 제작한 우수 콘텐츠에 대한 ‘해외 한국어 방송상’ 시상식을 열어, TV와 라디오 각 부문별 대상(과기정통부 장관상) 1편, 우수상(한국방송통신전파진흥원) 2편 등 총 6편을 시상했다.
 ㅇ TV부문 대상에는 미국 KBS AMERICA의 ‘다큐 : 끝나지 않은 6일, 429*’, 우수상은 인도네시아 SKY LBS TV의 ‘한국, 그 느낌 그대로!’와 몽골 KCBN의 ‘신의(神醫), 몽골에 뿌리를 내리다’가 선정 되었으며,
 * 1991년 로드니킹 구타사건(4.29)으로 시작된 6일간의 기록을 회고, 조명한 작품
 ㅇ 라디오부문 대상에는 미국 New York METRO RADIO의 ‘3.1절 기념 특집드라마 ‘독립운동의 횃불 김마리아'‘*가, 우수상에는 뉴질랜드 KNTV OCEANIA의 ‘가슴이 아파도 안길 곳이 없다'와 호주 SBS Radio1의 ‘도시를 바꾸는 워홀러**들'이 수상의 영광을 안았다.
 * 알려지지 않은 독립운동가 김마리아에 대해 알아보는 작품
 ** Working-holiday visa holder
□ 이날 개회식에 참석한 과기정통부 김용수 차관은 환영사에서 “전 세계에 한국어와 한국문화를 전파하고, 740만 재외동포 사회를 하나로 모으는 문화외교관의 역할을 수행하고 있는 해외 한국어방송사가 한류 확산의 전초기지로 자리매김 할 수 있도록 관심과 지원을 아끼지 않을 것이다.”라고 밝혔다.
□ 대회 둘째 날인 8일(수)에는, 국내 방송사와 방송콘텐츠 제작․유통 분야 협력방안을 논의하는 ‘글로벌 인적 네트워크 구축 워크숍’과, 지난 4월부터 7개월간 실시한 해외 한국어 방송사 현황조사 결과를 바탕으로 보다 실질적인 지원방안을 모색하는 세미나를 개최한다.
 ㅇ 아울러, 해외 한국어 방송인의 제작역량 강화를 위해 아나운싱(announcing) 교육과 초고화질(UHD), 가상현실(VR) 등 최신 실감영상 심화교육, 국제 공동제작 성공사례 등에 관한 전문가 강의 및 실습을 진행한다.
□ 대회 마지막 날인 9일(목) 오후에는, 2018년 2월 동계올림픽 개최지인 평창을 방문하여 올림픽 국제방송센터의 방송시설을 견학하고, 스키점프대 등 주요 경기장 시설을 둘러보는 일정이 계획되어 있다.
□ 과기정통부는 한국어 방송사의 자체 콘텐츠 제작, 국내 방송 콘텐츠 방영권 지원, 현지 방송 제작․기술 교육 등 해외 한국어 방송사를 2005년부터 지원해오고 있다.
 ※ (’17) : 자체 콘텐츠 제작지원 11건, 방영권 지원 104건, 미국, 중국, 뉴질랜드 지역 4회 연수 교육
 ㅇ 앞으로도 해외 한국어 방송사들이 급변하는 방송 미디어 환경 하에서 경쟁력을 높이고, 우리 문화의 해외 확산을 위한 중심축으로 성장할 수 있도록 지속적으로 지원해 나갈 계획이다.
참고 1. 해외 한국어방송대상 시상 현황
 2. 해외 한국어방송사 현황
참고1
 해외 한국어방송대상 시상 현황
□ 목 적

thread.title: SERÁ QUE EXISTEM PESSOAS QUE ATENDEM O CLIENTE PELA ROUPA?
thread.title_full: SERÁ QUE EXISTEM PESSOAS QUE ATENDEM O CLIENTE PELA ROUPA?

posts.author: blog Gazeta da Torre (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: SERÁ QUE EXISTEM PESSOAS QUE ATENDEM O CLIENTE PELA ROUPA?
posts.text:
Como já dizia o famoso filósofo Sócrates: “Eu só sei que nada sei”. Porém são tantas vivências pelos bairros da Torre e Madalena, assim como em tantos outros lugares visitados vida afora, que resolvi de comum acordo com o diretor do jornal Gazeta da Torre enveredar um pouco pelo “Mundo das Crônicas”. 
Por vezes me sinto um pouco (humildemente) como o ilustre professor Paulo Freire “lendo o mundo”. Por todos os lugares: Hipermercados e Mercadinhos, Frutarias, Delicatessens, Clínicas, Shopping Centers, Clubes... E até pelas caminhadas na Avenida Beira Rio. 
Aí surge a inspiração e o desejo de colocar no papel aquilo que, sendo fruto de vivências e reflexões, poderá viabilizar o “ensinar-aprender”. Vivências minhas e geralmente do meu “guru” com o qual divido e troco ideias... 
Pois bem, no mês passado, presenciamos um fato que infelizmente, nos fez perceber que ainda existem pessoas que “atende o cliente pela roupa que este usa”. Fiquei a observar o olhar, o tom de voz, os gestos da atendente. Senão um sorriso, pelo menos gentileza...  Veio-me logo à memória um exemplo sobre os DANOS e ENGANOS que a PERCEPÇÃO DE CADA UM pode cometer: Há alguns anos atrás, durante uma aula de psicologia na ESUDA sobre a PERCEPÇÃO, a professora Luiza colocou uma imagem de um Homem e perguntou à classe: Quem vocês acham que esta pessoa é? E a grande maioria expressou a sua PERCEPÇÃO em termos depreciativos sobre o personagem, por conta da APARÊNCIA. Conclusão: O Homem era um ilustre e renomado palestrante dos Estados unidos... Nunca esqueci! 
Diz-se que o “Cliente pode demitir todos de uma empresa, inclusive o dono”. O contexto contemporâneo aliado à intensa competitividade impulsiona empreendedores e empresários para que capacitem e INSPIREM os seus colaboradores quanto à Excelência no Atendimento. Atender com qualidade é obrigação, o cliente hoje espera ter suas expectativas superadas. Como profissional da área de desenvolvimento, observo que se deve evitar atender, levando em conta o mecanicismo e a impessoalidade, tendo o cuidado para não confundir e dispensar o profissionalismo, sem dúvida, fundamental. Muito cuidado ao atender o CLIENTE.  É bom lembrar que vivemos na Era da Tecnologia e como afirma Lee Cockerell, ex-vice-presidente executivo da Walt Disney World no seu livro A Magia do Atendimento: “Na era da mídia social, é fácil perder clientes aos milhares – até aos milhões – de uma só vez. Agora, com apenas alguns toques no teclado, um cliente infeliz, frustrado ou irritado pode convencer todos os seus contatos de e-mails, todos os seus amigos do Facebook e todas as pessoas que leem seu blog ou o seguem no Twitter a não fazer mais negócios com a empresa.” 
Vale refletir e investir na melhoria contínua de pessoas e processos de trabalho. Competência é SABER, SABER FAZER e FAZER! 
Boa sorte!

thread.title: Pudždemon kritikovao evropske političare
thread.title_full: Pudždemon kritikovao evropske političare

posts.title: Pudždemon kritikovao evropske političare
posts.text:
07. novembar 2017. | 09:59 → 20:09 | Izvor: Tanjug Čitaj mi Pudždemon kritikovao evropske političare BRISEL - 
Smenjeni predsednik katalonske vlade Karles Pudždemon kritikovao je danas pasivnost evropskih političara u pokazivanju solidarnosti sa raspuštenom katalonskom vladom i njenim uhapšenim ministrima. 
U intervjuu koji je iz Brisela dao za katalonski radio, lider separatista istakao je da postoji "apsolutna nepovezanost između interesa naroda i evropskih elita" i da je problem Katalonije "pitanje ljudskih prava koje zahteva maksimalnu pažnju", prenosi AP. 
Pudždemon se bori da ne bude izručen Španiji u kojoj je osam članova raspuštene katalonske vlade trenutno u pritvoru bez prava na kauciju dok čekaju rezultate istrage za smišljanje strategije za otcepljenje od Španije, prenose mediji. 
Centralne vlasti u Španiji sada drže pod direktnom kontrolom severoistočni poluautonomni region u kom se, prema prvim anketama pred izbore zakazane za 21. decembar, priprema predizborna trka između separatista i pristalica ujedinjenja. 
Pudždemon je zajedno sa svoja četiri ministra doputovao u Brisel pre nedelju dana, nakon što je centralna vlada Španije smenila katalonsku izvršnu vlast 28. oktobra i uvela direktnu kontrolu ti regionom čije proglašenje nezavisnosti nije priznala, a Ustavni sud Španije je saopštio da bi odvajanje Katalonije od Španije bilo nezakonito. 
Glasačkim kutijama protiv represije Madrida 
Smenjeni katalonski lider Karles Pudždemon izjavio je danas da će sledećeg meseca "poraziti u glasačkoj kutiji" ono što naziva "represijom španske vlade" zbog želje Katalonije za nezavisnošću. 
Pudždemon kaže da Katalonija ima jedan način da postane Republika - pomoću demokratije, prenosi AP. 
On je prebacio Evropskoj uniji na ponašanju i pitao hoće li prihvatiti rezultat katalonskog referenduma ili nastaviti da pomaže Marijanu Rahoju u, kako smatra, državnom udaru Madrida. 
Pudždemon je to rekao, uglavnom na francuskom jeziku, okupljenim gradonačelnicima gradova iz Katalonije u Muzeju umetnosti u Briselu. 
Oni su mu, čak i pre nego što je počeo da govori, aplaudirali, uzvikujući "predsednik". 
Pojedini gradonačelnici držali su slova koja su označavala reči "pomozite Kataloniji", a nakon govora otpevali su katalonsku himnu držeći podignute štapove za hodanje - simbol moći gradonačelnika u Španiji. 
Oko 200 gradonačelnika iz Katalonije okupilo se danas u Belgiji u znak podrške smenjenom predsedniku vlade te španske pokrajine Karlesu Pudždemonu, u trenutku kada Madrid traži njegovo izručenje radi suđenja. Podeli vest sa prijateljima:
